verses.roman:
āra dina sārvabhauma kahe prabhu-sthāne
abhaya-dāna deha' yadi, kari nivedane

synonyms: āra dina—the next day; sārvabhauma—Sārvabhauma Bhaṭṭācārya; kahe—says; prabhu-sthāne—in the presence of Lord Caitanya Mahāprabhu; abhaya-dāna—the charity of fearlessness; deha'—You give; yadi—if; kari—I do; nivedane—submission.
translation: The next day Sārvabhauma Bhaṭṭācārya requested Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu to give him permission to submit a statement without fear.
